name: The Rocket Jumper
description:
The Rocket Jumper is a 3D platformer that puts a twist on traditional gameplay by incorporating rocket jumping as the main element.
The game is inspired by Team Fortress 2 rocket jump maps but is more casual player-oriented. In The Rocket Jumper players control a character equipped with a rocket launcher that allows them to soar through levels and reach new heights. The "Classic Movement" mode includes bunny hopping, air strafing and surfing game mechanics. The objective is to navigate through each level and reach the end, using the rocket jumping to overcome obstacles. The game offers fast-paced action and challenging gameplay. The Rocket Jumper is sure to be a thrilling and unique experience for players of all skill levels.
